attributes.name: Raiders of the Chamber of Tomorrows
Raiders of the Chamber of Tomorrows

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGoTGc03o8kM9gjIkd_description
attribs.current: The thug makes two melee attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGoTGdV0f9m74i0WX8_description
attribs.current: The thug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: npc_type
attribs.current: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGoeNUEzxJ-aBshb49_description
attribs.current: A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGoeNUEzxJ-aBshb4A_description
attribs.current: The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:    Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation  1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield  2nd level (3 slots): misty step, suggestion  3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, fly  4th level (3 slots): greater invisibility, ice storm  5th level (1 slot): cone of cold

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUGoedAjB8pz9YQpAUX_spelldescription
attribs.current: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isnt being worn or carried. This spells damage increases by 1d10 when you reach 5th level (2d10), 11th level (3d10), and 17th level (4d10).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUGoedAjB8pz9YQpAUX_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature or object within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUGoedBAN8kTZ4sUgvf_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action. If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUGoedBAN8kTZ4sUgvf_spelltarget
attribs.current: One object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUGoedBAN8kTZ4sUgvg_spelldescription
attribs.current: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again. You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it. The hand cant attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUGoedBAN8kTZ4sUgvg_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUGoedCgZovgEYISfVc_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice. You create one of the following magical effects within range: You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor. You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire. You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot. You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour. You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour. You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand and that lasts until the end of your next turn. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGoedCgZovgEYISfVd_spelldescription
attribs.current: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic in this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears magic, and you learn its school of magic, if any. The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGoedD3Z6Q2xnyHXDK_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a willing creature who isnt wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The targets base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGoedD3Z6Q2xnyHXDK_spelltarget
attribs.current: A willing creature who isn't wearing armor

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGoedD3Z6Q2xnyHXDL_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell creates one more dart for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGoedD3Z6Q2xnyHXDL_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGoedD3Z6Q2xnyHXDL_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGoedFLgNsmayFAgG5_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you are hit by an attack or targeted by the magic missile spell

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUGoedFLgNsmayFAgG5_spelldescription
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUGoedFLgNsmayFAgG6_spelldescription
attribs.current: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUGoedFLgNsmayFAgG7_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A snake's tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUGoedFLgNsmayFAgG7_spelldescription
attribs.current: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence a creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. Creatures that cant be charmed are immune to this effect. The suggestion must be worded in such a manner as to make the course of action sound reasonable. Asking the creature to stab itself, throw itself onto a spear, immolate itself, or do some other obviously harmful act ends the spell. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it pursues the course of action you described to the best of its ability. The suggested course of action can continue for the entire duration. If the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends when the subject finishes what it was asked to do. You can also specify conditions that will trigger a special activity during the duration. For example, you might suggest that a knight give her warhorse to the first beggar she meets. If the condition isnt met before the spell expires, the activity isnt performed. If you or any of your companions damage the target, the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUGoedFLgNsmayFAgG7_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGoedGZqRNolIhxIpi_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the interrupted spell has no effect if its level is less than or equal to the level of the spell slot you used.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGoedGZqRNolIhxIpi_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you see a creature within 60 feet of you casting a spell

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGoedGZqRNolIhxIpi_spelldescription
attribs.current: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, its spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spells level. On a success, the creatures spell fails and has no effect.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGoedGZqRNolIhxIpi_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature in the process of casting a spell

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjS_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjS_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjS_spelldescription
attribs.current: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that arent being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjS_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjT_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjT_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A wing feather from any bird

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjT_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft, unless it can stop the fall.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjU_spelldescription
attribs.current: You or a creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the targets person.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjU_spelltarget
attribs.current: You or a creature you touch

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjV_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the bludgeoning damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjV_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A pinch of dust and a few drops of water

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjV_spelldescription
attribs.current: A hail of rock-hard ice pounds to the ground in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range. Each creature in the cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d8 bludgeoning damage and 4d6 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Hailstones turn the storms area of effect into difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjV_spelltarget
attribs.current: A 20-foot radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjW_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 5th.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjW_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A small crystal or glass cone

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-MUGoedHHy4ymUh49sjW_spelldescription
attribs.current: A blast of cold air erupts from your hands. Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 8d8 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature killed by this spell becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MUGoedINaNsQs1ygBAV_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUGpKTBePRAoZcxBMem_description
attribs.current: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGsCfUpa1j3hoPfXqE_description
attribs.current: Devinshire has advantage on attack rolls against a surprised creature.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUGsTT502DEjB4lP4Xn_description
attribs.current: Devinshire can mimic any sound he's heard by making a Charisma (Deception) check against the passive Wisdom (Insight) scores of any listeners. Success indicates they believe the sound was real.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQn6bT9Q4LiMsnM5_description
attribs.current: If the gnoll attacks two creatures in the same turn, the first target has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQn6bT9Q4LiMsnM6_description
attribs.current: The gnoll can Dash or Disengage as a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQn7t0W26y9JxDfQ_description
attribs.current: The gnoll has advantage on its attack rolls against a target if at least one of the gnoll's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTQn7t0W26y9JxDfR_description
attribs.current: The gnoll makes one bite attack and two battleaxe attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUVC2rmdYZEFuYJ6gWp_description
attribs.current: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUVC5BOcevwNilNFxkF_name
attribs.current: Bites (swarm has more than half HP)

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUVC5BOcevwNilNFxkF_attack_target
attribs.current: one creature in the swarm's space

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUVC5BOcevwNilNFxkG_name
attribs.current: Bites (swarm has half HP or less)

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUVC5BOcevwNilNFxkG_attack_target
attribs.current: one creature in the swarm's space

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUVC5BOcevwNilNFxkH_description
attribs.current: The swarm has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUVC5BOcevwNilNFxkI_description
attribs.current: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny quipper. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUVC5BOcevwNilNFxkJ_description
attribs.current: The swarm can breathe only underwater.

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

attribs.name: npc_type
attribs.current: Medium swarm of tiny beasts, unaligned

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUVC5BOcevwNilNFxkF_attack_tohitrange
attribs.current: +5, Reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUVC5BOcevwNilNFxkG_attack_tohitrange
attribs.current: +5, Reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUeu4BDk1hn-e4-Q3vb_description
attribs.current: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUeu4BDk1hn-e4-Q3vc_name
attribs.current: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUeu4BDk1hn-e4-Q3vc_description
attribs.current: If the boar takes 10 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUevDh8quePed4pAIf1_description
attribs.current: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUevDh9AhG5IWMz576r_description
attribs.current: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUevZd49RbQCSLPP7MD_description
attribs.current: The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUevZd49RbQCSLPP7ME_description
attribs.current: The wraith targets a humanoid within 10 feet of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently. The target's spirit rises as a specter in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUevZd49RbQCSLPP7MF_description
attribs.current: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUevZd49RbQCSLPP7MG_description
attribs.current: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: the languages it knew in life
